XenotypeDef.label: Brood Mother
XenotypeDef.description: A human host that has been modified genetically to birth amor tentacles.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A human host that has been modified genetically to birth amor tentacles.

XenotypeDef.label: Brood Host
XenotypeDef.description: A human host that has been modified genetically to birth malar tentacles.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A human host that has been modified genetically to birth malar tentacles.

XenotypeDef.label: Amor Baroness
XenotypeDef.description: A human host that has been modified genetically to birth amor tentacles.
